to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience

sentences.english: Automated assessment of the subjective test is one of key techniques in automated assessment system.
sentences.chinese: 主观题阅卷技术是计算机自动阅卷中的关键技术。

sentences.english: Automated assessment of the subjective test is one of key techniques in automated assessment system.
sentences.chinese: 主观题阅卷技术是计算机自动阅卷中的关键技术。

sentences.english: In Foreign Languages Department, a checking machine is used to correct the students' test papers.
sentences.chinese: 外语教研部用阅卷机给学生批卷。

sentences.english: No student is allowed in staff room during marking period unless supervised by a teacher.
sentences.chinese: 考试阅卷期间，没有老师在场，学生不得进入办公室。

sentences.english: Our tearchersare going through our papers in their office.
sentences.chinese: 我们的老师正在办公室阅卷。

sentences.english: Finally the design of the main form of the reviewing terminal is described.
sentences.chinese: 最后描述了阅卷终端主窗体的设计。

sentences.english: In support of these theories, the article presents a subjective question marking system based on .
sentences.chinese: 主观题阅卷系统是一个值得研究的问题。
